Uses of Interface
net.sandius.rembulan.env.RuntimeEnvironment

  • Packages that use RuntimeEnvironment 
    Package Description
    net.sandius.rembulan.env
    Access to the runtime environment accessed by the standard library.
    net.sandius.rembulan.lib
    An abstract interface to the standard library.

    • Uses of RuntimeEnvironment in net.sandius.rembulan.env

      Methods in net.sandius.rembulan.env that return RuntimeEnvironment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RuntimeEnvironment RuntimeEnvironments.system()
      Returns the system runtime environment.
      static RuntimeEnvironment RuntimeEnvironments.system(InputStream in, OutputStream out, OutputStream err)
      Returns the system runtime environment that uses the specified standard input, output and error streams.

    • Uses of RuntimeEnvironment in net.sandius.rembulan.lib

      Methods in net.sandius.rembulan.lib with parameters of type RuntimeEnvironment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LuaFunction OsLib.clock(RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment)
      Returns a function os.clock that uses the runtime environment runtimeEnvironment.
      static LuaFunction OsLib.getenv(RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment)
      Returns a function os.getenv that uses the runtime environment runtimeEnvironment.
      static StandardLibrary StandardLibrary.in(RuntimeEnvironment environment)
      Returns a default configuration for the specified environment.
      static void OsLib.installInto(StateContext context, Table env, RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment)
      Installs the coroutine library to the global environment env in the state context context.
      static void IoLib.installInto(StateContext context, Table env, RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment)
      Installs the I/O library to the global environment env in the state context context.
      static void BasicLib.installInto(StateContext context, Table env, RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment, ChunkLoader loader)
      Installs the basic library into the specified table env in the state context context.
      static void ModuleLib.installInto(StateContext context, Table env, RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment, ChunkLoader chunkLoader, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Installs the package library to the global environment env in the state context context.
      LuaFunction LoaderProvider.newLoader(RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment, Table env)
      Returns a new instance of the loader function for this library.
